column3: Refactor this code to not nest more than 3 if/for/while/switch/try statements.
Move this variable to comply with Java Code Conventions.
Replace the synchronized class "Hashtable" by an unsynchronized one such as "HashMap".
Move the "" string literal on the left side of this string comparison.
Add the "@Override" annotation above this method signature
Either log or rethrow this exception.
This block of commented-out lines of code should be removed.
Use isEmpty() to check whether the collection is empty or not.
Complete the task associated to this TODO comment.
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal "ignore" 4 times.
The return type of this method should be an interface such as "Map" rather than the implementation "Hashtable".
Introduce a new variable instead of reusing the parameter "name".
Merge this if statement with the enclosing one.
Take the required action to fix the issue indicated by this comment.
The Cyclomatic Complexity of this method "parsePackages" is 18 which is greater than 10 authorized.
Replace these toUpperCase()/toLowerCase() and equals() calls with a single equalsIgnoreCase() call.
Replace this usage of System.out or System.err by a logger.
Reduce the total number of break and continue statement in this loop to use at most one.
Make change a static final constant or non-public and provide accessors if needed.
The Cyclomatic Complexity of this class is 315 which is greater than 200 authorized.
Extract this nested try block into a separate method.
Remove this call to "wait" or move it into a "while" loop.
Add the missing @Deprecated annotation.
Do not forget to remove this deprecated code someday.
Reduce the number of conditional operators (4) used in the expression (maximum allowed 3).
Either remove this useless object instantiation of class "URL" or use it
Make this array "private".
Catch Exception instead of Throwable.
Define and throw a dedicated exception instead of using a generic one.
Use a logger to log this exception.
Return an empty array instead of null.
